text: Ara yakhana tadera bala haya -- ''allah tomadera ya riyeka diyechena ta theke kharaca karo.’’ Takhana yara abisbasa posana kare tara bale tadera yara bisbasa kareche -- ''amara ki tadera kha'oyaba yadera, allah yadi ca'itena tabe tini'i kha'oyate paratena? Tomara spasta bhulera madhye chara ara kotha'o to na'o.’’
